commit message: Add user token and account name using oauth.
Added php script that gets the access token.
Saving refresh token and expiry date for oauth.
Added memory, cpu and disk to droplet.
Save all networks related to a droplet

German translation added

I aimed for consistency and reuse of expressions to make using the app
easier for the german-speaking user.

Synced german translation with original contents

Added the new strings and translated them to german.

Fixed typos in original language files

Adjusted casing for several strings.
Made the use of 'synchronisation' vs. 'synchronization' consistent,
always using 'synchroisation' now.
Added translation for Simplified and Traditional Chinese.
Updated the actions to work with api v2
Updated domain records to use API V2
Updated domains to use API V2
Added the ability to refresh the oauth token 3 days before the expire
prompt user to authenticate on a fresh install or when no account is available
get droplet by id from the api and improved notifications management.
